channel.title: NYS:SNV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:SNV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pinnacle Agrees to Buy Synovus in $8.6 Billion Stock Deal
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. agreed to acquire Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion, potentially setting off a wave of banking M&A.

item.title: Pinnacle Agrees to Buy Synovus in $8.6 Billion Stock Deal
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. agreed to acquire Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion, potentially setting off a wave of banking M&A.

item.title: Synovus Weighs Potential Merger After Drawing Takeover Interest
item.description: Synovus Financial Corp., a regional bank in the southeastern US, is weighing options including a potential merger after drawing interest, people familiar with the matter said.
